Detailed Description

Structure that defines a compilation target.

This structure defines a compilation target for the ispc compiler.

Definition at line 158 of file ispc.h.

Definition at line 166 of file ispc.h.

Referenced by DefineStdlib(), lDoTarget(), LowerMaskedStorePass::runOnBasicBlock(), Target(), and Module::writeHeader().

int Target::nativeVectorWidth

Native vector width of the vector instruction set. Note that this value is directly derived from the ISA Being used (e.g. it's 4 for SSE, 8 for AVX, etc.)

Definition at line 177 of file ispc.h.

Referenced by FunctionEmitContext::AllocaInst(), VectorType::GetDIType(), VectorType::getVectorMemoryCount(), FunctionEmitContext::LaunchInst(), lDoTarget(), lEmitVectorTypedefs(), lInitFunSymDecl(), and Target().

int Target::vectorWidth

Actual vector width currently being compiled to. This may be an integer multiple of the native vector width, for example if we're "doubling up" and compiling 8-wide on a 4-wide SSE system.
